verses.roman:
prātaḥ-kāle mahāprabhu nija-gaṇa lañā
jagannātha darśana kaila sundarācale yāñā

synonyms: prātaḥ-kāle—in the morning; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nija-gaṇa lañā—taking His associates; jagannātha darśana—visiting Lord Jagannātha; kaila—performed; sundarācale—to the Guṇḍicā temple; yāñā—going.
translation: In the morning, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu took His personal associates with Him to see Lord Jagannātha at Sundarācala.

purport.content: Sundarācala is the Guṇḍicā temple. The temple of Jagannātha at Jagannātha Purī is called Nīlācala, and the temple at Guṇḍicā is called Sundarācala.
